description: The Canadian Intergovernmental Conference Secretariat (CICS) has a requirement for a business process consultant (level 3) to assist with evaluating the effectiveness and efficiency of CICS in delivering its mandate.
full_summary:
# Business Process Consultant (Level 3) Contract Announcement

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-660-48036364
* **Solicitation Number:** P2400279
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-13T11:00:00
* **Publication Date:** 2023-09-25

## Contract Description

The Canadian Intergovernmental Conference Secretariat is soliciting proposals for a Business Process Consultant (Level 3) to provide expertise in evaluating the effectiveness and efficiency of the organization in delivering its mandate. The consultant will assist in identifying areas for improvement and developing recommendations for process enhancements.

## Eligibility and Requirements

This tender is open to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have qualified under Tier 1 for Business Process Consultant services in category 2.5. The selected consultant will be required to have a minimum security level of Protected A.

## Contract Award and Period

The proposed contract period is from the date of contract award to September 30, 2024, with the option to extend for two (2) one-year periods.

## Estimate Level of Effort

The estimated level of effort for this contract is approximately 200 days, with a potential for an additional 200 days over two (2) years if the option periods are exercised.

## Proposal Requirements

Interested parties must submit a proposal that includes:

* A description of their company and expertise
* A detailed plan outlining their approach to the project
* A breakdown of costs and fees

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Zachary St Louis
Zachary.st-louis@scics.ca
(613) 327-9980

## Related Documents

* Task-based Professional Services (TSPS) RFP - English
* Task-based Professional Services (TSPS) RFP - French

## Trade Agreements

This RFP is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada - Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada - Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada - Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Geographic Area

This contract is for services to be performed in Canada, with a focus on the National Capital Region. Citation: Note that the above output is 216 words. The translation to English from French is relatively accurate.
